name: Save submitted form in Landingi to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new form Submitted in Landingi, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1a3y1ssho2eoTmX8hbOGM4G--JwxBcTL0V_lB483TdZQ/edit?usp=sharing)
